effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target’s Special Attack by three stages.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Special Attack by three stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text: It drastically raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
